mapper.insert: insert into p2p_activity (Id, platform_id, title, isFirst, bestName, bestDeposit, bestMoney, bestInterest, joins, status, statusDisplay, requiredImage, requiredUsername, url, mobileUrl, content, orderby) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platform_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bestDeposit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bestMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bestInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{joins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requiredImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requiredUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderby})
mapper.select: select a.*,b.name,b.plat_name,b.platform_intro,b.platform_img,b.platform_tags,b.risk, b.riskDisplay,b.finance_bg,b.platform_bg,b.bank_manage,b.icp_card, b.cash_speed,b.principal,b.online,b.remark from p2p_activity a,p2p_platform b where a.platform_id=b.id and a.id = #{id}

select a.*,b.name,b.plat_name,b.platform_intro,b.platform_img,b.platform_tags,b.risk, b.riskDisplay,b.finance_bg,b.platform_bg,b.bank_manage,b.icp_card, b.cash_speed,b.principal,b.online,b.remark from p2p_activity a,p2p_platform b where a.platform_id=b.id and a.status = '1' order by a.orderby desc
